tool_description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.
title: Football Prediction

api_list.name: Head To Head
api_list.description: Shows head to head stats and previous encounters for the home and away team of an upcoming match.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the search to only X previous encounters. (max is 10)

api_list.name: Home Team League Stats
api_list.description: Shows the league table and stats for the home team of an upcoming match.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/home-league-stats/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Home Team Last 10 Matches
api_list.description: Grab the statistics and list of the last 10 matches played by the home team for a certain ID

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

api_list.name: Prediction Details
api_list.description: Grab all available predictions for a match id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/predictions/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List available federations
api_list.description: Returns an array of all the available federations.
api_list.code:

url = "https://football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/list-federations"

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Performance stats for past predictions
api_list.description: Returns information about the accuracy of past predictions. (in the last day, 7 days, 14 days and 30 days) Can be additionally filtered by federation and market. If no market filter is provided it defaults to classic

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: Show stats for a different prediction market. Defaults to "classic" if not provided

api_list.name: Get list of fixture IDs
api_list.description:
Returns a list of fixture IDs that can be used to make requests to endpoints expecting a ID url parameter.
Can be filtered by:

- iso_date
- market
- federation
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/get-list-of-fixture-ids"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "football-prediction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
